job_tasks.phrase: IT Security is very important to DeepL. To ensure that our data remains secure, you will join our Security team, working closely with our engineering teams to secure our applications, systems, devices, and environments.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase establishes the business context and the importance of security within the company's operations.

job_tasks.phrase: Depending on your focus area, you will: Have an open eye for security improvements
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a need to understand the existing systems and identify areas for improvement, which aligns with business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Perform security reviews and advise other teams with security-related questions
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding the security needs of other teams and providing guidance, which requires business context.

job_tasks.phrase: Recognize threats and triage upcoming vulnerabilities
job_tasks.justification: Identifying and assessing threats and vulnerabilities involves a form of 'modeling' or pattern recognition of security risks.

job_tasks.phrase: Help building solutions to improve the security of our infrastructure, network, and services
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the development of technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Automate security processes in the development life-cycle
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating security practices into the development lifecycle, a key aspect of DevSecOps/MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Create visibility by onboarding new events into our SIEM
job_tasks.justification: Onboarding events into a SIEM (Security Information and Event Management) system is an operational task focused on monitoring and logging.

soft_skills.phrase: working closely with our engineering teams
experienced, supportive, and collaborative IT Security team
advise other teams with security-related questions
smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback
Have an open eye for security improvements
Recognize threats and triage upcoming vulnerabilities
Help building solutions to improve the security of our infrastructure, network, and services
Automate security processes in the development life-cycle
Create visibility by onboarding new events into our SIEM

classification.rationale: This job description focuses on IT Security, with tasks involving threat recognition, vulnerability triage, and automating security processes within the development lifecycle. It does not explicitly mention generative AI models, LLMs, or related GenAI engineering responsibilities, placing it outside the scope of the 'GenAI Engineer' profile.
